title: My Sister Never Called Me Brother - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Childhood Friends   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Shameless Protagonist   Siblings   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Younger Sisters
author: 业舞
description: A man who is honest is also treated with sincerity. Nevertheless, I still want to experience the pains of youth, evading the childhood friend’s knife. Conquering your sister, opening the path to your own harem, and achieve a “Happy End” utopia. It’s been rumored that I’ve been devilishly pushed a lot on my path by my sister. But it doesn’t matter—because I already bought a wheelchair ages ago, AH HA HA HA!...>
